languages.text: "Да будет так! Отныне я — твоя последовательница и твоя разящая длань!"
"So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"
languages.original_text: "Да будет так! Отныне я — твоя последовательница и твоя разящая длань!"

traits.locale_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: “那就这样吧！从现在起，我就是你的追随者，我会为你降下惩罚！”
languages.original_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"

traits.locale_text: “那就这样吧！从现在起，我就是你的追随者，我会为你降下惩罚！”
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: «¡Que así sea! Desde ahora, ¡soy su humilde seguidora y su mano castigadora!».
languages.original_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que así sea! Desde ahora, ¡soy su humilde seguidora y su mano castigadora!».
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: 「ならばそうであれ！これより私は、お前の従者にして、その槌とならん！」
languages.original_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"

traits.locale_text: 「ならばそうであれ！これより私は、お前の従者にして、その槌とならん！」
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: « Très bien ! À partir de maintenant, je serai votre fidèle bras armé ! »
languages.original_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"

traits.locale_text: « Très bien ! À partir de maintenant, je serai votre fidèle bras armé ! »
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "So sei es! Von nun an werde ich Euch folgen und Eure richtende Hand sein!"
languages.original_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"

traits.locale_text: "So sei es! Von nun an werde ich Euch folgen und Eure richtende Hand sein!"
traits.speaker: Hope_Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Tamam o vakit! Bundan böyle takipçin ve sağkolunum!"
languages.original_text: "So be it! From now on, I am your follower and your smiting hand!"
